Region1_NumRows = Recordset1.RecordCount + 1; Recordset1_NumRows = Recordset1_NumRows + Region1_NumRows;

<!--- Sample CFC text ---> <cfcomponent> <cffunction name="myFunction" access="public" returntype="string"> <cfargument name="myArgument" type="string" required="true"> <cfset myResult="foo"> <cfreturn myResult> </cffunction> </cfcomponent>

<%@ page language="java" import="java.sql.*"%> <%@ include file="Connections/MyConnection.jsp" %> <% Driver myDriver = (Driver)Class.forName(driver).newInstance(); Connection myConnection = DriverManager.getConnection(connectString, userName, password); Statement myStatement = myConnection.createStatement(); ResultSet myResultSet = myStatement.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM ACC.USERS"); %> <% while (myResultSet.next()) { %> <% } %>
<%= myResultSet.getString("EXT_NUM") %> <%= myResultSet.getString("NAME") %>
<% myResultSet.close(); myConnection.close(); %>

<?php 
mysql_connect ($host, $user, $password);
$result = mysql_db_query ("database","select * from table");
while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc ($result))
{
  echo $row["user_id"];
  echo $row["fullname"];
}
mysql_free_result ($result);
?>

<%@ Import Namespace="System.Data" %> <%@ Import Namespace="System.Data.SqlClient" %>
Title Publisher ID Price
<%# DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "title") %> <%# DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "pub_id") %> <%# DataBinder.Eval(Container.DataItem, "price", "{0:c}") %>

<%@ Page Language="CS" %> <%@ Import Namespace="System.Data" %>

DataGrid Sorting Example

<%@LANGUAGE="VBSCRIPT"%> <% dim count set rsAuthors = Server.CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset") rsAuthors.ActiveConnection = MM_smokeTest_STRING rsAuthors.Source = "SELECT * FROM dbo.authors" rsAuthors.CursorType = 0 rsAuthors.Open() %> <% 'Iterate through the Recordset while not rsAuthors.EOF %>

Division Name: <%=UCase(rsAuthors("Name").Value & vbCrLf)%>

<% count = count + 1 rsAuthors.MoveNext Wend %> <% rs.Close %>

<%@LANGUAGE="JAVASCRIPT"%> <% var count; var rsAuthors = Server.CreateObject("ADODB.Recordset"); rsAuthors.ActiveConnection = MM_smokeTest_STRING; rsAuthors.Source = "SELECT * FROM dbo.authors"; rsAuthors.CursorType = 0; rsAuthors.Open(); %> <% // Iterate through the Recordset while (!rsAuthors.EOF()) { %>

Division Name: <%=rsAuthors("Name").Value()%>

<% count++; rsAuthors.MoveNext(); } // while %> <% rs.Close(); %>
